snippet: Researchers expressed frustration after two men who had been treated with bone-marrow procedures saw their H.I.V. return.
abstract: Researchers express frustration after two men who had been treated with bone-marrow procedures saw their HIV return; many had hoped that the 'graft versus host' battle that virtually all such transplants set off could become a potent weapon, at least in a few high-risk cases.
lead_paragraph: Researchers expressed frustration after two men who had been treated with bone-marrow procedures saw their H.I.V. return.

headline.main: Marrow Transplants Fail to Cure Two H.I.V. Patients
headline.print_headline: Marrow Transplants Fail To Cure Two H.I.V. Patients
